As part of our online learning strategy, teachers will provide scholars \u201Clive\u201D lessons where the teacher is giving immediate feedback to scholars online. Unfortunately, some scholars may not be able to attend these \u201Clive\u201D lessons. To accommodate these scholars, we want to record the live lesson so that they can view at another time. These recordings will not be public. If you do not want your child recorded as part of the live lesson, please complete the OPT OUT FORM (English) or OPT OUT FORM (Somali) no later than April 22, 2020.
ALL HARVEST BEST ACADEMY SCHOLARS WILL RECEIVE A LAPTOP TO USE DURING THE SCHOOL CLOSURE.
LAPTOPS WILL ONLY BE DISTRIBUTED TO SCHOLARS WITH A SIGNED FAMILY TECHNOLOGY FORM.
Harvest Best Academy will be offering instruction via distance learning between March 30th and May 4th, 2020.
Please see the Distance Learning Plan for more information.
Harvest Best Academy Board of Directors will hold a special board meeting on April 20, 2020 from 5:00pm-6:00pm. This will be a remote meeting held through GoToMeeting.

div.h1: Building a solid foundation for student success.
div.p: Harvest Best Academy is a K-8 school founded on the belief that “all of our children can excel if given the time and support that they need.” Harvest Best Academy is a high-performing K-8 public charter school transforming north Minneapolis through education.

div.data-block-json: {"blockAnimation":"none","layout":"caption-hidden","overlay":false,"description":{"html":"Eric Mahmoud (http://ericmahmoud.com/) Explains Harvest Preparatory/Seed Academy's Success Seed Academy/Harvest Preparatory School (http://www.seed-harvest.org/) started in the home of Eric and Ella Mahmoud and has grown into a thriving school, serving over 475 children from pre-school to sixth grade. It is the only accredited full-time, African-centered pre-school and elementary school in the state of Minnesota."},"hSize":null,"floatDir":null,"html":"<iframe src=\"//www.youtube.com/embed/ZVfCOtt-axg?wmode=opaque&enablejsapi=1\" height=\"480\" width=\"854\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\">\n</iframe>","url":"https://youtu.be/ZVfCOtt-axg","width":854,"height":480,"providerName":"YouTube","thumbnailUrl":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ZVfCOtt-axg/hqdefault.jpg","resolvedBy":"youtube"}

div.p: Find out about our gap-closing approach to education. We don't just beat the odds, we've raised the bar!

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

li.p: March 18, 2020- May 4, 2020- School Closed/Teachers will be in contact with students daily

April 20, 2020- Special Board Meeting via GoToMeeting, 5:00pm-6:00pm
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/272073421

div.span: Best Academy, 1300 Olson Memorial Highway, Minneapolis, MN, 55411, United States
